reviews.review:
Pros:

- Its fun-ish
- It's Half-Life
- It's Half-Life Deathmatch

Cons:

- $12 overpriced for this
- It only has like 2 people playing now
- It's glitchy
- You can't even change your player model unless you use the console
- It actually looks worse than the original

4/10 No
its so fun, but if you buy the game you yourself are about 5% of the people online, if you find a server with a lot of people or get some friends to play its a blast
I've barely played this game and I can already say it's super fun. Servers are deserted which sucks, but other than that it's a cool game.

The complete Half-Life Deathmatch package . The mechanics and physics in game are mixed with the old and Source engine . The big problem is with the small playersbase , so if you have some friends who can play it with you too , go to some empty server and goof around .
the half life source for gmod if you don't have half life source
classic, only ever a few people online but great with friends
No one online  servers  take to long to load  and just get half life 2 deathmatch
i got the orange box and when i saw this source game i was like NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO and then i played it for an lil and it was actually fun
Why does this come with the orange box?
One of the best way to kill your time, played it a looooot on another account, and i still love it. its just half life, but deathmatch, thats what i like.
